🎨QING.节点对齐.外圈半径.name: Menu Outer Radius
🎨QING.节点对齐.外圈半径.tooltip: Adjust the outer circle size of the alignment menu (pixels). Larger menus are easier to select but occupy more screen space.

🎨QING.节点对齐.内圈半径.name: Menu Inner Radius
🎨QING.节点对齐.内圈半径.tooltip: Adjust the inner circle size of the alignment menu (pixels). The inner circle is the cancel area; releasing the mouse in this area will not perform any alignment operation.

🎨QING.节点对齐.主色调.name: Primary Color
🎨QING.节点对齐.主色调.tooltip: Set the primary color for menu sectors (Top Align, Right Align, Bottom Align, Left Align, Vertical Distribute, Horizontal Distribute).

🎨QING.节点对齐.次色调.name: Secondary Color
🎨QING.节点对齐.次色调.tooltip: Set the secondary color for menu sectors (Vertical Center, Horizontal Center, Stretch Vertically, Stretch Horizontally).

🎨QING.节点对齐.动画速度.name: Animation Speed
🎨QING.节点对齐.动画速度.tooltip: Adjust the animation speed for menu show/hide. Fast mode is more responsive, slow mode has more elegant animations.

🎨QING.节点对齐.Tooltip偏移.name: Tooltip Offset
🎨QING.节点对齐.Tooltip偏移.tooltip: Adjust the horizontal offset distance of the tooltip next to the mouse (pixels).

🎨QING.节点对齐.消息持续时间.name: Message Duration
🎨QING.节点对齐.消息持续时间.tooltip: Adjust the display time of operation messages (milliseconds).

🎨QING.节点对齐.撤回历史记录.name: Undo History
🎨QING.节点对齐.撤回历史记录.tooltip: Number of alignment operations that can be undone (Ctrl+Z). Higher values use more memory but allow more undo steps.

🎨QING.节点对齐.快捷键.name: Menu Shortcut
🎨QING.节点对齐.快捷键.tooltip: Set the keyboard shortcut to open the alignment menu. Refresh the page after modification to take effect.

🎨QING.API配置.GLM_API_Key.name: Zhipu GLM API Key
🎨QING.API配置.GLM_API_Key.tooltip: API key for Zhipu AI GLM language and vision models. Changes will be synced to local configuration file in real-time.

🎨QING.API配置.Volcengine_API_Key.name: Volcengine API Key
🎨QING.API配置.Volcengine_API_Key.tooltip: API key for Volcengine platform models. Changes will be synced to local configuration file in real-time.

🎨QING.API配置.Dashscope_API_Key.name: Alibaba Dashscope API Key
🎨QING.API配置.Dashscope_API_Key.tooltip: API key for Alibaba Cloud Dashscope platform models. Changes will be synced to local configuration file in real-time.

🎨QING.API配置.Siliconflow_API_Key.name: Siliconflow API Key
🎨QING.API配置.Siliconflow_API_Key.tooltip: API key for Siliconflow platform models. Changes will be synced to local configuration file in real-time.

🎨QING.API配置.TencentLkeap_API_Key.name: Tencent Cloud API Key
🎨QING.API配置.TencentLkeap_API_Key.tooltip: API key for Tencent Cloud Knowledge Engine platform DeepSeek models. Changes will be synced to local configuration file in real-time.

🎨QING.API配置.Moonshot_API_Key.name: Moonshot API Key
🎨QING.API配置.Moonshot_API_Key.tooltip: API key for Moonshot platform Kimi models. Changes will be synced to local configuration file in real-time.

🎨QING.API配置.Gemini_API_Key.name: Google Gemini API Key
🎨QING.API配置.Gemini_API_Key.tooltip: API key for Google AI Studio Gemini vision models. Changes will be synced to local configuration file in real-time.
